member.name: AASHELLMENUFILENAME
member.summary: A variable-size structure that contains information about a menu file name.

member.name: AASHELLMENUFILENAME.cbTotal
member.summary: The size of the structure, in bytes.

member.name: AASHELLMENUFILENAME.rgbReserved
member.summary: Reserved. Applications should ignore this value.

member.name: AASHELLMENUFILENAME.szFileName
member.summary: The menu file name. This string is in Unicode on Windows 2000.
